name: api-adopet
description: API for the pet adoption website Adopet.

scripts.dev: npm install && npm run migrate && npm run seed && nodemon --delay 500ms server.js
scripts.test:unit: npm rebuild && npm run drop-test-db && export NODE_ENV=test && npm run migrate && jest --testPathIgnorePatterns=./api/tests/routes --detectOpenHandles
scripts.test:integration: npm rebuild && npm run drop-test-db && export NODE_ENV=test && npm run migrate && jest ./api/tests/routes --detectOpenHandles
